statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProfile WHERE age > 18;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM StudentProfile WHERE grade_level = 12;
SELECT student_id, first_name, age FROM StudentProfile WHERE grade_level >= 9 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProfile WHERE grade_level = 10 AND age < 16 ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, email FROM StudentProfile WHERE grade_level = 11 AND last_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM StudentProfile WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM StudentProfile WHERE grade_level = 10 ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM StudentProfile WHERE age BETWEEN 15 AND 17 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT * FROM StudentProfile WHERE grade_level = 12 AND age >= 18 AND email LIKE '%@school.com%'
SELECT student_id, first_name, age FROM StudentProfile WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM student_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM student_profiles WHERE age > 18;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM educational_content WHERE content_type = 'Article';

SELECT content_title, created_by FROM educational_content WHERE content_type = 'Video' ORDER BY content_id DESC;

SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM educational_content WHERE created_by = 'admin' ORDER BY content_title ASC;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE age > 20;

SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM Students JOIN UserProfiles ON Students.student_id = UserProfiles.student_id WHERE progress < 0.5;

SELECT first_name, last_name FROM student_profiles WHERE grade_level='Sophomore';
SELECT * FROM subjects WHERE subject_name LIKE 'Math%';

SELECT course_name, subject_name FROM courses INNER JOIN subjects ON courses.subject_id = subjects.subject_id;

SELECT first_name, last_name FROM student_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT course_name, subject_name, description FROM courses JOIN subjects ON courses.subject_id = subjects.subject_id
SELECT student_id, course_id, preference_level FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_level >= 3 ORDER BY student_id

SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM courses ORDER BY instructor DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_courses WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM student_courses INNER JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, course_name, progress_percentage FROM student_courses INNER JOIN progress ON student_courses.enrollment_id = progress.enrollment_id WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
